name: Poofers Poofected - Dish
text: This card cannot be Xyz Summoned. This card can attack your opponent directly. After damage calculation, if this card battled: You can add 1 "Poofers" card from your Deck or GY to your hand. Once per turn (Quick Effect): You can banish 1 "Poofers" monster from your hand, field, or GY and target 1 monster your opponent controls; return it to the hand.
